  • Method Details

    • getUser

      @PostMapping("TimeTogether/user") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getUser(@RequestBody String apiInput)
      Retrieves complete user information based on email and password.
      Parameters:
      apiInput - User data in JSON format including email and password.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with user information or an error if not found.

    • getGroup

      @GetMapping("TimeTogether/group") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getGroup(@RequestParam("id") String apiInput)
      Retrieves complete information of a group based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      apiInput - ID of the group to search for.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the group information or an error if not found.

    • getEvent

      @GetMapping("TimeTogether/event") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getEvent(@RequestParam("id") String apiInput)
      Retrieves information of an event based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      apiInput - ID of the event to search for.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the event information or an error if not found.

    • getFriendInformation

      @GetMapping("TimeTogether/friendInfo") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getFriendInformation(@RequestParam("id") String apiInput)
      Retrieves information of a friend based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      apiInput - ID of the friend to search for.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the friend's information or an error if not found.

    • getFriends

      @GetMapping("TimeTogether/friends") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getFriends(@RequestParam("id") String apiInput)
      Retrieves the friends of a user based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      apiInput - ID of the user whose friends are being searched for.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the list of friends or an error if not found.

    • getUserGroups

      @GetMapping("TimeTogether/userGroups") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getUserGroups(@RequestParam("userId") String userId)
      Retrieves the groups a user belongs to based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the user's groups or an error if not found.

    • getUserIdByEmail

      @GetMapping("TimeTogether/userIdByEmail") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getUserIdByEmail(@RequestParam("email") String email)
      Retrieves the ID of a user based on their email address.
      Parameters:
      email - Email address of the user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the user's ID or an error if not found.

    • postUser

      @PostMapping("TimeTogether/newUser") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> postUser(@RequestBody String apiInput)
      Registers a new user in the system.
      Parameters:
      apiInput - Data of the new user in JSON format.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating success or failure in user creation.

    • verifyUserCode

      @PostMapping("TimeTogether/verifyCode") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Boolean> verifyUserCode(@RequestBody String requestBody)
      Verifies the verification code sent to the user's email.
      Parameters:
      requestBody - Data including the user's email and the verification code.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the result of the verification.

    • postGroup

      @PostMapping("TimeTogether/newGroup") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> postGroup(@RequestBody String apiInput)
      Creates a new group in the system.
      Parameters:
      apiInput - Data of the new group in JSON format.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating success or failure in the creation of the group.

    • postEvent

      @PostMapping("TimeTogether/newEvent") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> postEvent(@RequestBody String apiInput)
      Creates a new event in the system.
      Parameters:
      apiInput - Data of the new event in JSON format.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating success or failure in the creation of the event.

    • updateUser

      @PutMapping("TimeTogether/updateUser/{userId}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updateUser(@PathVariable String userId, @RequestBody String apiInput)
      Updates the information of an existing user.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the user to be updated.
      apiInput - Updated user data in JSON format.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating success or failure in updating the user.

    • getEventsByUserAndDate

      @PostMapping("TimeTogether/eventsByUserAndDate") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getEventsByUserAndDate(@RequestBody String requestBody)
      Retrieves the events a user is participating in on a specific date.
      Parameters:
      requestBody - Data including the user's ID and the date of the events.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the user's events on the given date or an error if not found.

    • addGroupToUsersByName

      @PostMapping("TimeTogether/addGroupToUsers") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addGroupToUsersByName(@RequestBody String requestBody)
      Adds a group to the specified users by name.
      Parameters:
      requestBody - Data including the name of the group and the IDs of the users.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating success or failure in adding the group to the users.

    • addFriend

      @PostMapping("TimeTogether/addFriend") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addFriend(@RequestBody String apiInput)
      Adds a user to the friend list of the user based on the user's id and the friend's email.
      Parameters:
      apiInput - User id (userId) and friend's email (mail) in JSON format.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating success or failure in adding the friend.

    • removeFriend

      @PostMapping("TimeTogether/removeFriend") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> removeFriend(@RequestBody String apiInput)
      Removes a friend from the user's friend list based on the user's id and the friend's id.
      Parameters:
      apiInput - User id (userId) and friend's id (friendId) in JSON format.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating success or failure in removing the friend.
